name: Duke Nukem Forever: The Doctor Who Cloned Me
name_original: Duke Nukem Forever: The Doctor Who Cloned Me
description:
Duke Nukem Forever: The Doctor Who Cloned Me is an action-shooter game developed by Gearbox Software and Triptych Games. It came out on 13-12-2011. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Duke Nukem Forever: The Doctor Who Cloned Me is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
